people_also_ask.question: What are hair accessories examples?
people_also_ask.heading: Infinitely varied in shapes, sizes, and materials, examples of hair accessories include: hair rings or bands, ribbons and bows, hairpins, hair combs, barrettes, beads, thread or string, hair spikes and sticks, and other affixed miscellaneous objects (shells, jewels, coins, flowers, feathers) perceived to have aesthetic ...

people_also_ask.question: What are hair accessories?
people_also_ask.heading: Hair accessories are functional or ornamental objects wrapped, tied, twisted, inserted, or otherwise attached to the hair. ... Hair rings and hair bands are cylindrically shaped hair accessories wound around the hair, designed to hold hair away from the face, or otherwise confine strands of hair.
